title: Vec3.UnitVector and Camera.NewCamera panic on zero/degenerate inputs
description:
vec3.go UnitVector() calls Scale(1.0 / Length()). Zero vector causes division by zero panic.

camera.go NewCamera() doesn't validate:
- lookFrom == lookAt produces zero w vector -> panic in UnitVector
- vUp parallel to (lookFrom - lookAt) produces zero Cross product -> panic

Fix: UnitVector should return zero vector (or error) for zero-length input. NewCamera should validate its inputs and return an error for degenerate configurations.

Files: demos/raytracer-agent/vec3.go line 59, demos/raytracer-agent/camera.go lines 27-35
